Event.Message: Reliability Analysis created %1 sessions of type %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Reliability Analysis SQM upload duration is %1 seconds.
Reliability Analysis encountered an error. Reliability Analysis error code is %1. Windows error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RacError" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="WinError" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Reliability Analysis calculated system stability of %1 for the one-day period starting at %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Stability" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Date" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: Reliability Analysis calculated operating system reliability metrics for the time period that ends at %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RacClientGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CalculationEndingTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToBlueScrn" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToUpdate" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToAppInstall" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToRemoteAccess" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToDriverInstall" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToOsUpgrade" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToOsConfig" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToAppUnresponsive" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToAppCrash" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToHardwareFailure" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToWindowsMemoryDiagnosis" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToSecurity" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToCriticalProcessFailure" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_DownCorrelatedToMemoryExhaustion" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="UtcTimeStability" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Availability" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="MeanTimeToShutdown" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanTimeToDisruptiveDown" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanDownTime" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanDownTime_ByBlueScreen" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanDownTime_ByPatchInstall" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanDownTime_ByAppInstall" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanDownTime_ByAppCrash" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanDownTime_ByAppHang" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="Runtime" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="Count_Shutdown" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Count_BlueScreen" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Count_DiskFailure_NTFSCorruption" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Count_AppCrash" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Count_AppHang" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Count_PatchInstall" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Frequency_DownPerYear" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Frequency_DisruptiveDownPerYear" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_FailedPatchInstall" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_FailedAppInstall" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Percent_FailedSleep" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> </template>

Event.Message: Reliability Analysis calculated reliability metrics of service %3 for the time period that ends at %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RacClientGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CalculationEndingTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServiceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Count_Shutdown" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="MeanDownTime" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanTimeToShutdown" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="Availability" inType="win:Float" outType="xs:float"/> <data name="Runtime" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> </template>

Event.Message: Reliability Analysis calculated reliability metrics of application %3, version %4 for the time period that ends at %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RacClientGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CalculationEndingTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="AppName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Count_Crash" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="Count_Hang" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="MeanTimeToShutdown" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MeanTimeToFailure" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> </template>
